DOM.standard: Our philosophy is to meaningfully connect the various parts of our environment and to facilitate a smooth communication with among them. Through the efficient use of new and smart technologies, we create new living environments and situations that guarantee a simpler, safer, more comfortable and more energy-efficient future.

In order to meet the needs of all users, it is our highest priority to offer each customer an individual and custom-made implementation. Every person has different requirements, fears and goals. Therefore, we create - together with our clients - the best fit to support their everyday needs and expectations.
